data PV1CustomRedeemer = PV1CustomRedeemer {
  • mCrOutputs :: [TxOut]
  • mCrInputs :: [TxInInfo]
  • mCrMint :: Value
  • mCrValidRange :: POSIXTimeRange
  • mCrFee :: Value
  • mCrDatums :: [(DatumHash, Datum)]
  • mCrCerts :: [DCert]
  • mCrSignatories :: [PubKeyHash]
  • mCrScriptPurpose :: Maybe ScriptPurpose
}
name: PV1CustomRedeemer PV1CustomRedeemer mCrOutputs mCrInputs mCrMint mCrValidRange mCrFee mCrDatums mCrCerts mCrSignatories mCrScriptPurpose

display_html:
data PV2CustomRedeemer = PV2CustomRedeemer {
  • pv2Inputs :: [TxInInfo]
  • pv2RefInputs :: [TxInInfo]
  • pv2Outputs :: [TxOut]
  • pv2Fee :: Value
  • pv2Mint :: Value
  • pv2DCert :: [DCert]
  • pv2Wdrl :: Map StakingCredential Integer
  • pv2ValidRange :: POSIXTimeRange
  • pv2Signatories :: [PubKeyHash]
  • pv2Redeemers :: Map ScriptPurpose Redeemer
  • pv2Data :: Map DatumHash Datum
  • pv2ScriptPurpose :: Maybe ScriptPurpose
}

display_html:
data ScriptContextError
  • = NoScriptsInByronEra
  • | NoScriptsInEra
  • | ReadTxBodyError (FileError TextEnvelopeError)
  • | IntervalConvError Text
  • | AcquireFail AcquiringFailure
  • | NoTipLocalStateError
  • | NoSystemStartTimeError
  • | EnvVarSocketErr EnvSocketError
  • | ScriptContextErrorByronEra
  • | QueryError ShelleyQueryCmdError
  • | ConsensusModeMismatch AnyConsensusMode AnyCardanoEra
  • | EraMismatch !EraMismatch
  • | PlutusV2TranslationError (TranslationError StandardCrypto)
  • | MoreThanOneTxInput
name: ScriptContextError MoreThanOneTxInput PlutusV2TranslationError ConsensusModeMismatch QueryError ScriptContextErrorByronEra EnvVarSocketErr NoSystemStartTimeError NoTipLocalStateError AcquireFail IntervalConvError ReadTxBodyError NoScriptsInEra NoScriptsInByronEra EraMismatch
